Class Appliance

java.lang.Object
appliances.Appliance
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicTVAppliance, BasicWashingMachineAppliance, LCDTVAppliance, SuperFastWashingMachineAppliance
public abstract class Appliance extends Object
Author:
24862664 Abstract class representing a general Appliance. Provides common properties and methods for all appliances.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected String
    category
    The category to which the appliance belongs.
    protected String
    description
    A brief description of the appliance.
    protected int
    id
    The unique identifier of the appliance.
    protected double
    price
    The price of the appliance.
    protected String
    sku
    The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the appliance.
